column4: people, how can I work with Windows FTP resources in my LAN with Ubuntu?
you mean 'what ftp client are there for ubuntu' ?

theres literally DOZENS of ftp clients out. :P even the gnome file manager can doit. Depends on what features ya want in one. I recall a 'ftp file system' thing somewhere the could even mount them. (never used that however)
fire up synaptic and search for 'ftp' and see wht look good.
